rule.ruleDesc: Run schedule to close related child incidents.
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"nullsub(master.incident in $L.file,false)=true and jscall("settings.getSettingValue","Incident","master.relation.model")="cascade""</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run schedule to close related child incidents. (when ( Expression: nullsub(master.incident in $L.file,false)=true and jscall("settings.getSettingValue","Incident","master.relation.model")="cascade"))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"runAction","actionType":"2","relationType":"","ruleset":"im.close.incident.schedule","action":"0","filename":"probsummary","actionQueryXml":"<collection logic='and' negative='false'><query><operand><field name='parent.incident' caption='Parent Incident' datatype='string'/></operand><operator name='equals' caption='Equals'/><value type='CurrentRecord' caption='CurrentRecord'><field name='number' caption='Incident ID'/></value></query></collection>"}

rule.ruleDesc: Run Scheduled Action on All Child Incidents
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"nullsub(master.incident in $L.file,false)=true and jscall("settings.getSettingValue","Incident","master.relation.model")="independent""</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run Scheduled Action on All Child Incidents (when ( Expression: nullsub(master.incident in $L.file,false)=true and jscall("settings.getSettingValue","Incident","master.relation.model")="independent"))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"runAction","actionType":"2","relationType":"","ruleset":"im.reset.allchild.status","action":"0","filename":"probsummary","actionQueryXml":"<collection logic='and' negative='false'><query><operand><field name='parent.incident' caption='Parent Incident' datatype='string'/></operand><operator name='equals' caption='Equals'/><value type='CurrentRecord' caption='CurrentRecord'><field name='number' caption='Incident ID'/></value></query></collection>"}
